Plot: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.
Title: Think Like a Man
Writer: Keith Merryman (screenplay), David A. Newman (screenplay), Steve Harvey (book)
Actors: Michael Ealy, Jerry Ferrara, Meagan Good, Regina Hall
tomatoConsensus: In Think Like a Man, an otherwise standard rom-com is partially elevated by a committed -- and attractive -- cast, resulting in a funny take on modern romance.
